35520.summary: Some customers in the Aberdeen area of Kamloops are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35520.title: Mar 28 – Kamloops (Aberdeen) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: As some customers begin to come online we continue to work along side BC Hydro to ensure customers are online as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
BC Hydro is still working to restore power to affected areas. Services will begin to come online as power is restored.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
